section.p:
If there is a tick in the box, immediately.
If not, , and read on.
A strange, vaguely humanoid shape, flickering with energy, soars down to attack you. You must fight.
If you win, it fades away, leaving a clear blue jewel, worth . Note the money on your sheet directly.
If you lose, it’s the end of you, unless you have a resurrection deal. If you still live, there’s nothing else up here, so you climb down again. .
